## Description {#details}

&#39;&#91;classname&#93;&#39; - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> of record values that have zero or more superclasses.

The list of superclasses is non-redundant, i.e. only contains classes that are not the superclass of some other listed class.

Definition at line 231 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h">Record.h</a>.
